A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Poor plot\, a lot of wasted opportunity. I am a life long Star Wars fan and have enjoyed all Star Wars films in there own way up until this point. I firstly want to say there was some amazing shots and some interesting idea\, however this can't save the slow pace and pointless plot elements. I couldn't believe this had such a positive early reaction. I feel cheated and genuinely upset after watching this.  

The handling of certain characters such as fin were so poor they made them feel like there was no point of them still being in the film. 

Overall the film was ok but for how good the force awakens and rogue one were this to me was a rare miss for all things Disney
